RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Eduardo Acquarone doutorando em Mdias Digitais na Universidade Nova de Lisboa, e em Cincias da Comunicao na Escola de Sociologia e Polticas Pblicas do ISCTE, com teses sobre Narrativas Imersivas em No-Fico. 

Com formao em Jornalismo e Rdio e Televiso, Eduardo Acquarone dirige, cria e roteiriza projetos digitais. 

Trabalha com inovao desde 2008, quando lanou o Globo Amaznia, projeto indicado ao Emmy Digital e que conseguiu mais de 55 milhes de protestos virtuais contra a destruio da floresta. Em 2015 estudou no Tow-Knight Center for Entrepreneurial Journalism em Nova York, onde fundou a Flying Content, uma empresa de histrias digitais. 

Durante 15 anos foi editor e, posteriormente, responsvel por projetos de inovao jornalstica na TV Globo e no G1 em So Paulo. 

Atualmente pesquisador do Observatrio Brasileiro de Televiso Digital e do LabArteMdia - http://dgp.cnpq.br/dgp/espelhogrupo/232143, ambos da Escola de Comunicao e Artes da Universidade de So Paulo. Tem inmeras reportagens jornalsticas publicadas pela Rede Globo, Reuters e CBS, alm de artigos cientficos e participao em livros.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Writer, director, creator, and producer of digital projects using mobile, social, gamification, and geolocation elements. Director and producer of 360 videos and VR initiatives for news.

Digital Emmy Non-Fiction finalist in 2011 for Globo Amaznia, a collaborative news portal that engaged users in making nearly 55 million virtual protests.

2015 Fellow at CUNY's Tow-Knight Center for Entrepreneurial Journalism in New York. Founder of Flying Content, a digital storytelling company which believes that location is one of the most important elements for meaningful experiences.

Experienced journalist in several industries: TV, online, and news agencies, both in Brazil and in the United States.

Background in world news, sports, technology, environment. Interested in photography, documentaries.

DOUTORADO.TITULO-DA-DISSERTACAO-TESE: Imerso nas notcias: como a Realidade Virtual pode ajudar o jornalismo a solucionar problemas reais

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Outras atividades profissionais, cientficas e tcnicas

DOUTORADO.NOME-INSTITUICAO: Faculdade de Cincias Sociais da Universidade Nova

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES:
Development of new projects at G1, including VR and 360 videos. Responsible for the web version of TV Globo's hard and soft news programs.

Creator of Globo Amaznia, a news vertical that brought together TV, online, and social media in order to track the destruction of the Amazon forest and to promote public awareness.

Other highlights include:

- Social Media: managed the team that takes care of some of the most important newscasts in Brazil; helped implement the News division Facebook strategy; launched Facebook Live at G1

- 360 videos: directed the news coverage of the Brazilian Carnival and Lollapalooza Festival

- Madrugames: directed the first TV show produced by G1 (Globo's news website), broadcast nationally on Brazilian television; Madrugames was a 13-episode show about videogame culture

- Political Interviews: directed 1-hour live web interviews for G1 with all the running candidates for the Brazilian Presidency

- Jovens do Brasil: created a social outlet to help users create news stories on Jornal Hoje, an afternoon newscast at TV Globo

- Misso Bioma: created the first Brazilian newsgame, launched in 2012, targeting the young generation that likes online games but does not read the news

- Studio G1: directed a series of live musical encounters with some of the most promising upcoming musicians in Brazil

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES:
- Senior Writer for Fantstico, one of the highest-rated TV shows in Brazil (40 million viewers weekly), and Profisso Reprter, a weekly show with an innovative format, a mix of long stories and reality show for new reporters

- Producer of special environmental reports about the Amazon region

- Also responsible for sports, music, soft, and hard news stories
VINCULOS.OUTRO-ENQUADRAMENTO-FUNCIONAL-INFORMADO: Editor do Fantstico e Profisso Reprter

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES:
Flying Content is a digital storytelling company which believes that location is one of the most important elements for meaningful experiences.

Our mobile devices, wearables, or connected cars know exactly where we are ? and that is why we work on content and delivery methods that take location into account.

Flying Content will help you connect to your audience through their devices, wherever they are: in their neighborhood, in the city, or in another country.

Finalist of the Startup for News 2016, project that selects the most promising startups in the Media landscape.
